title: cityI/O
subtitle: Cloud-based Urban Data Platform
text:
cityI/O (input/output) is a cloud and database-driven platform that enables remote participation, database augmentation, and high-end complex visualization for urban data. It can be accessed from anywhere, on multiple platforms and devices, through client-side apps or web-based interfaces. The cityI/O platform serves as a versatile tool for urban data management and analysis, facilitating collaboration and exploration of urban phenomena.

For more information and to access the cityI/O platform, visit the cityIO Front End.
